description: This Python source file defines a function `get_agent` that creates and returns different agent objects based on the provided agent name. It imports various tools and classes, sets up a directory, and provides detailed instructions and descriptions for each agent type, such as calculator, data analyst, python agent, research agent, and investment agent.

methods.name: get_agent
methods.description: Creates and returns an Agent object configured according to the specified agent name, with appropriate tools, descriptions, and instructions.
